name: Eldora - Compact, Fullscreen, No clutter
description:
Removes clutter from the eldora menu websites and makes the page more compact and readable. Works on any eldora menu website.

By default this style applies to all eldora menu sites with the format www.eldora-[COMPANY].ch
Examples: eldora-suva.ch, eldora-csgastronomy.ch, eldora-roche.ch
